com.hms_networks.americas.sc.config

Class ConfigFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hms_networks.americas.sc.config.ConfigFile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TWConnectorConfig

    public abstract class ConfigFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for simplifying and managing the creation and storage of configuration files in various applications.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      JSONObject configurationObject
      Configuration object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean fileExists()
      Gets a boolean representing the presence of the configuration file in the file system.
      abstract java.lang.String getConfigFilePath()
      Gets the file path for reading and saving the configuration to disk.
      abstract JSONObject getDefaultConfigurationObject()
      Creates a configuration JSON object containing fields and their default values.
      abstract int getJSONIndentFactor()
      Gets the indent factor used when saving the configuration to file.
      void loadAndSaveDefaultConfiguration()
      Loads the default configuration contents into memory and writes to the file system.
      void read()
      Reads the configuration from the file at the file path specified in getConfigFilePath().
      void save()
      Writes the configuration to file using the file path specified in getConfigFilePath().

      • getConfigFilePath

        public abstract java.lang.String getConfigFilePath()
        Gets the file path for reading and saving the configuration to disk.
        Returns:
        configuration file path

      • getJSONIndentFactor

        public abstract int getJSONIndentFactor()
        Gets the indent factor used when saving the configuration to file.
        Returns:
        JSON file indent factor

      • getDefaultConfigurationObject

        public abstract JSONObject getDefaultConfigurationObject()
                                                  throws JSONException
        Creates a configuration JSON object containing fields and their default values.
        Returns:
        configuration object with defaults
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • read

        public void read()
          throws ConfigFileReadException,
                 ConfigFileParseException
        Reads the configuration from the file at the file path specified in getConfigFilePath().
        Throws:
        ConfigFileReadException - if unable to read file
        ConfigFileParseException - if unable to parse file contents

      • save

        public void save()
          throws ConfigFileWriteException
        Writes the configuration to file using the file path specified in getConfigFilePath().
        Throws:
        ConfigFileWriteException - if unable to write to file

      • fileExists

        public boolean fileExists()
        Gets a boolean representing the presence of the configuration file in the file system.
        Returns:
        true if configuration file exists on in the file system

      • loadAndSaveDefaultConfiguration

        public void loadAndSaveDefaultConfiguration()
                                     throws ConfigFileWriteException
        Loads the default configuration contents into memory and writes to the file system.
        Throws:
        ConfigFileWriteException - if unable to write to file
